KSP2 Version: 0.1.0.0.20892
Operating System: Windows 11
CPU,GPU and RAM: i9 9900KF, RTX 2060 (6GB VRAM), 32GB RAM 
Mods: 0
Description of the bug: When I press the prograde button, the ship goes retrograde.

Had the same bug twice already. Quite confusing and weird!

Hope they will fix this with patch 2.

I have also had this issue but it was down to constructing my rocket in reverse. (Engines first, up to top, instead of top down). Or just simply having my commanding module rotated backwards (which it looks like yours is in the video) Since realising my mistake, I have never had this issue again.

Edited March 18, 2023 by GtMatt
It looks like you need to invert the controls. I had a similar issue as I put a probe core upsidedown (so everything was in reverse)

Another possible solution is to make sure you are controlling the craft from the desired cockpit. You can right click and click "control from here" on any piece and it will align the trackball to that piece's "up" direction.
